name: Violet Fungus
description: A dangerous, carnivorous plant with long spongy stalks ending in whiplike tendrils, resembling ordinary fungi when motionless.
memorable: Can perfectly mimic normal fungus and inflicts necrotic damage.
goals: Ambush unsuspecting creatures and absorb nutrients from their decaying remains.
relations: Often found in clusters, posing a greater threat in dungeon settings.
strengths: Immunity to various conditions and the ability to blend into surroundings.
weaknesses: Very low physical attributes, particularly vulnerable to fire.
attacks: Utilizes Rotting Touch to inflict necrotic damage with a reach of 10 feet.
most_powerful_ability: False Appearance allows it to remain motionless and blend in with its environment.
senses: Has blindsight out to 30 feet, enabling it to perceive without vision.
additional_information: Vulnerable to fire, taking double damage.
Condition immunities include being blinded, charmed, frightened, and more.
Can use Necrotic Spores to damage nearby creatures.
Regularly poses threats to adventurers in confined spaces.
Notable for its ability to deceive with its appearance.
test_queries: fungus that blends in with surroundings
